title: Amherst's Dobson: Trump's Housing Move ‘Patently Wrong'
description: Sean Dobson, CEO of Amherst, says banning institutional investors from the single-family housing market would not improve affordability. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that targeting investors is “patently wrong.” (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Sean Dobson, CEO of Amherst, says banning institutional investors from the single-family housing market would not improve affordability. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that targeting investors is “patently wrong.” (Source: Bloomberg)
